body.p:
To His Excellency Governor Bramlette
Sir

The undersigned would very respectfully recommend the appointment of Captain Edward H. Green of the 11th Regiment of Kentucky Cavalry as Lieu Col of that Regiment the position recently held in that Regiment by the Canceled Lieutenant Col Boyle

Captain Green has been an Officer of the Regiment ever since its organization, He is a Gentleman of intelligence, prudence and great energy of Character and injoys the reputation of a true and gallant Soldier We trust you will draw it consistent with the public interist to reword the gallant services of Captain Green by this appointment.

L W Powell
Garrett Davis
A. Harding
R Mallory
H. Grider
Brutus J. Clay
Luc Anderson

(over)
Thos. A. Hendriks
Wm S. Holeman
John Law
J. A. Cravens
H W Harrington
D W Voorhees
